dcterms:creator: Arthur Prindle
Phillip Samayoa
Ivan Razinkov
Tal Danino
Lev S. Tsimring
Jeff Hasty
dcterms:description: This dataset involves engineered E. coli bacteria that produce and emit a superfolded green fluorescence protein (sfGFP) as part of a quorum sensing mechanism, encapsulated in hydrogel for molecular communication applications.
dcterms:title: E. coli pTD103luxI_sfGFP

dcterms:creator: Ping Li
Xiaoqiu Dou
Mareike Müller
Chuanliang Feng
Matthew Wook Chang
Martin Frettlöh
Holger Schönherr
dcterms:description: This dataset describes the use of autoinducer sensing microarrays created by encapsulating reporter bacteria in hybrid supramolecular-polysaccharide hydrogels, aimed at detecting bacterial communication signals.
dcterms:title: Autoinducer Sensing Microarrays

dcterms:creator: Ping Li
Mareike Müller
Matthew Wook Chang
Martin Frettlöh
Holger Schönherr
dcterms:description: This dataset focuses on the encapsulation of autoinducer sensing reporter bacteria in reinforced alginate-based microbeads, which enhances the stability and functionality of the sensing system.
dcterms:title: Encapsulation of autoinducer sensing reporter bacteria
